com.se.simplicity.rendering.engine
Interface RenderingEngine

All Superinterfaces:
Engine, java.lang.Runnable
public interface RenderingEngine
extends Engine

Manages the renderng of a SceneGraph. Each advance re-renders the SceneGraph in its current state.

Author:
Gary Buyn

Adds a Light to this RenderingEngine.

clearsBeforeRender

boolean clearsBeforeRender()

Determines if the screen buffer is cleared before rendering.

Returns:
True if the screen buffer is cleared before rendering.

advance

void advance()

Renders the SceneGraph.

This method should be called by Viewports in order to display an updated SceneGraph.

Specified by:
advance in interface Engine

SceneGraph getSceneGraph()

Retrieves the SceneGraph to be rendered.

Returns:
The SceneGraph to be rendered.

renderSceneGraph

void renderSceneGraph()

Renders the SceneGraph.

Preparation of the rendering environment including camera transformation should not be performed from within this method. Instead this should be performed in the advance() method.
